subtopics.name: Technical Implementation
subtopics.description: The direct application of knowledge through specific tools, technologies and methodologies, representing how theoretical understanding is transformed into concrete solutions and functional systems

subtopics.name: Skill Development
subtopics.description: The embodied knowledge expressed through learned capabilities and practiced expertise, showing how abstract understanding becomes internalized into repeatable actions and refined abilities

subtopics.name: Problem Solving
subtopics.description: The strategic application of knowledge to address challenges and achieve objectives, demonstrating how understanding is deployed to transform situations and create desired outcomes

subtopics.name: Creative Expression
subtopics.description: The manifestation of knowledge through innovative and artistic endeavors, revealing how understanding enables new forms of making and doing that expand human capabilities

subtopics.name: Experiential Learning
subtopics.description: The cyclical process of applying knowledge, observing results, and refining approach, showing how practical application feeds back into empirical understanding and conceptual frameworks
